content: Are we allowed to mimic / reference the bisection code written in the lecture 3 notes when we write our own bisection code part c of the pset if we are able to explain each line?
subject: PSET 1 Part C

content: You're allowed to use any resource available in the lecture notes, as long as you make sure to comment your code and aren't directly copy/pasting. The implementation of bisection search will differ depending on the problem you are solving.
